ygData.subject: Re: EQ Slowly Dying?
ygData.msgSnippet: not flaming you, but if you play in the right spots, you can powerlevel yourself....if you want to do that sort of thing....if not, it s up to you...some ppl
ygData.messageBody:
not flaming you, but if you play in the right spots, you can powerlevel
yourself....if you want to do that sort of thing....if not, it's up to you...some
ppl just like hearing a ding more often than others (;


> As for another comment somewhere else about Fennin being overcrowded. I play
> on Cazic Thule and find it is fairly decent most places. There are a few
> zones where all the jerks go to and I keep away from those. But there are
> also some where people are extremely decent and helpful. What I have noticed
> is that power gamers seem to generally belong to the first category.
